body:
So you add up all the money that you've earned based on what you've done in real life. My life costs $106.10 Post how much your life costs; I'm bored .-.

Had a conversation with a stranger - $5
Faced your fears at least two times - $14
Never eaten in 24 hours (A day) - $8
Cried yourself to sleep - $11
Ever been in a fight - $2
Got in trouble by a police officer (Not arrested) - $17
Got caught for doing something you shouldn't have been doing - $0.75
Had straight A's - $23
Won a contest (Remember in real life!) - $0.25
Dyed your hair - $2.50
Passed out - $19
Injured any parts of your body - $15.25
Had/Have more than 3 pets - $27
Dropped your phone a bunch of times - $0.10
Went on a date with someone - $6
Ever got asked on a date (Iz different from ^) - $22
Been at a party - $12
Got expelled - $4
Ate a whole box of cookies in one day - $0.60
Made something you were proud of - $20
Never slept until midnight (New years does not count .___.) - $0.25
Pee'd in the pool - $0.25
Played spin the bottle - $1
Went insane for a whole day - $0.70
Regret something that you did (That is extremely serious) - $12
Have above 10 friends on Avicus! - $1
Ate a bowl of cereal - $0.5 (According to kycraftt)
